title: Tori Spelling shares Disneyland throwbacks from the 80s in honor of brother Randy's 41st birthday
text:
Tori Spelling took a walk down memory lane Wednesday.

The BH90210 star, 46, shared a throwback photo to wish her younger brother Randy - who is seen in the photo with his sister at Disneyland - a happy 41st birthday via Instagram.

'Growing up my brother @randyspelling and I loved going to the HAPPIEST place on earth #Disneyland and today I wish my younger bro the HAPPIEST birthday!' she wrote in the caption.

Sweet snap: Tori Spelling, 46, shared a throwback photo taken at Disneyland in the early 1980s to wish her brother Randy a happy 41st birthday

In the adorable snap, which is believed to have been taken in the early 1980s, Tori can be seen snuggling up to the Sleepy character from Sleeping Beauty with brown banged hair.

Keeping with the Disney theme, she wore a white Mickey Mouse t-shirt along with a pair of dark blue jeans.

Brother Randy can be seen in overalls on Sleepy's opposite side also offering a big hug to the famed Disney character.

Sibling love: The actress went on to praise Randy as 'an amazing dad, husband, brother, son, friend, and inspiration to all he encounters; the sibling are seen together in 2017

After wishing him a happy birthday, the actress went on to praise Randy as 'an amazing dad, husband, brother, son, friend, and inspiration to all he encounters. So proud of you!'

She went on to give her 1.4 million Instagram followers a little inside information about Randy when they were kids.

'My friends and I used to call him blonde pea bc he was like you see in this pic the cutest little stinker with blonde hair!!!'

Hollywood royalty: Tori and Randy are the children of Arron Spelling, the famed television and film producer of many hits like Charlie's Angels, The Rookies, The Love Boat, Dynasty Beverly Hills 90210, 7th heaven and Charmed

She concluded with: 'Love you @randyspelling xoxo PS- follow him and go to his website www.randyspelling.com to learn more about his amazing life coaching sessions, courses, and retreats!'

As of 2009, Randy has been working as a life coach between Portland, Oregon and Los Angeles.

He has also worked as an actor since his teenage years, scoring roles in several shows that his famous father, Aaron Spelling, produced, including: Malibu Shores (1996), Beverly Hills 90210 and Sunset Beach (1997-1999).

The Los Angeles native also took part in the reality television series Sons Of Hollywood (2007).
description: Tori Spelling shared a throwback photo on Instagram to wish her younger brother Randy - who is seen of the photo with his sister at Disneyland -  a happy 41st birthday,
